name: Huge Man Marry The Bride - dress up girl game
name_original: Huge Man Marry The Bride - dress up girl game
description: Have you heard it? Our Huge Man decides to get married. He is getting ready for his wedding! Can you imagine what would his bride look like? The wedding is holy. There will be held in three different space and lots of people will take part in it. Come and help the lovely bride and handsome groom dress up on their special wedding day! Let's make their dream come true!
